@notice Processes emissions and rebases. Callable once per epoch (1 week).
 @return _period Start of current epoch.

IMinterV1.metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.19+commit.7dd6d404"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[{"inputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_minted","type":"uint256"}],"name":"calculate_growth","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_growth","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"name":"update_period","outputs":[{"internalType":"uint256","name":"_period","type":"uint256"}],"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"calculate_growth(uint256)":{"returns":{"_growth":"Rebases"}},"update_period()":{"returns":{"_period":"Start of current epoch."}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"calculate_growth(uint256)":{"notice":"Calculates rebases according to the formula         weekly * (ve.totalSupply / velo.totalSupply) ^ 3 / 2         Note that ve.totalSupply is the locked ve supply         velo.totalSupply is the total ve supply minted"},"update_period()":{"notice":"Processes emissions and rebases.
